text: THE -MAN CONDITION: Use this table to determine whether you have this condition
name: manCondition

choices.text: You do not have this condition
You have this condition. Your last name will include the suffix -man. If your name already has -man at the end of it, I guess you're just going to have -manman at the end of your name.

text: THE CONDITION CONDITION: Use this table to determine what this condition will do to you.
name: conditionCondition

choices.text: You do not have this condition.
You're big. Your name must have "Big" at the beginning of it.
You are older than you once were. Your name must have "Old" at the beginning of it.
You are how you currently are. Please add your answer from Section 2, Number 11 to the beginning of your name.

text: THE CLONE CONDITION: Use this table to determine what this condition will do to you.
name: cloneCondition

choices.text: You do not have this condition.

You are a clone of someone else, or you have been brainwashed into becoming a mental doppelganger of someone else. Find someone who has completed this worksheet and replace 50% of your Kojima name with 50% of their Kojima name.

text: THE KOJIMA CONDITION: Use this table to determine if you have this condition.
name: kojimaCondition

choices.text: You do not have this condition.
